verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou art the sinner’s friend, So I Thy friendship claim, A sinner saved by grace, When Thy sweet message came.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So let me sing Thy praise, So let me call Thee mine. I cannot doubt Thy word, I know that I am Thine.{/lang-eng}
